info.title: Invalid Password
info.message: Password is invalid. It should be at least 8 characters long, and should contain at least 1 uppercase letter, lowercase letter, special character and number.

info.title: Invalid Username
info.message: Username is invalid. It should be between 4 and 19 characters long, and should only contain numbers, letters and underscores.

info.title: Non-Matching Passwords
info.message: Passwords do not match. Verify that the two passwords you have typed in are the same.
